meta_description.title: Phantasy Star IV - Wikipedia
meta_description.text: Phantasy Star IV: The End of the Millennium is a role-playing video game developed and published by Sega for the Sega Genesis. meta_description.title: Phantasy Star IV (1993) - MobyGames
meta_description.text: Phantasy Star IV is a Japanese-style role-playing game with top-down world map exploration, random enemy encounters, and turn-based combat.

meta_description.text: Phantasy Star IV is the fourth released game from Sega's epic Phantasy Star series, one of Sega's biggest RPGs on the Mega Drive / Genesis.

knowledge_panel.description: phantasy star iv: the end of the millennium is a role-playing video game developed and published by sega for the sega genesis. it was released in japan in 1993 and europe and north america in 1995. it is the fourth and final game in the original phantasy star series, concluding the story of the algol star system. wikipedia
